Category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/292:Manufacture of bodies (coachwork) for motor vehicles; manufacture of trailers and semi-trailers/2920:Manufacture of bodies (coachwork) for motor vehicles; manufacture of traile
Description: The container side rails are welded to create a frame. The walls of the container are made from corrugated steel. In order to protect the container againt different weather conditions zinc coating is needed. ;Technical sketch of the differnt parts of the shipping container. Source: (http://shippingandfreightresource.com/how-strong-is-your-container-floorboard/, accessed 20141015).;The container has door on one side which can be locked using four locking bars. The doors have rubber seal gasket to ensure the water resistence of the container. ;The most used refrigerant in refrigeration machines is the R134a. Since this refrigerant has a high global warming potential the refrigeration technology producers started producing referigeration machines with alternative refrigerants (Carrier, 2014, http://dms.hvacpartners.com//docs/2000/Public/0D/62-11665.pdf, accessed 20141105). One of them is liquid carbon dioxide.
